text: Ricardo Ribas (born 8 October 1977) is a Portuguese long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male long-distance runners Category:Portuguese male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Portugal Category:S.L. title: Ricardo Ribas
